mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College baseball team of 1974-1975 was made up of: Back row (L to R): Joe Nadicksbernd (coach), Barry Thomas, Mike Turpin, Dan Boyer, Rick Marks, Barry Mathis, Bob Simons, Rick Burke, Steve Kines. Middle row (L ro R): Don Bressoud, Henry Carrier, Greg Fisher, C.T. Danna, Mike Moore. Front row (L to R): Jeff Leazer, Rob Salvatore, Jim Comarata, Larry Warren, Jeff Ryan.
